-- ************************************** selling.price_for_sale
CREATE TABLE selling.price_for_sale
(
 "id"          serial NOT NULL,
 price_list_id int NOT NULL,
 discount_id   int NULL,
 create_by     int4 NOT NULL,
 create_date   timestamp NOT NULL,
 CONSTRAINT PK_25_1 PRIMARY KEY ( "id" ),
 CONSTRAINT FK_45_1 FOREIGN KEY ( price_list_id ) REFERENCES selling.price_list ( "id" ),
 CONSTRAINT FK_46_1 FOREIGN KEY ( discount_id ) REFERENCES selling.discount ( "id" )
);

CREATE INDEX FK_1 ON selling.price_for_sale
(
 price_list_id
);

CREATE INDEX FK_2 ON selling.price_for_sale
(
 discount_id
);

COMMENT ON TABLE selling.price_for_sale IS 'Цена изделия';

COMMENT ON COLUMN selling.price_for_sale.price_list_id IS 'Цена по прайс листу';
COMMENT ON COLUMN selling.price_for_sale.discount_id IS 'Скидка/надбавка';
